item.title: I wish I were 1/3 as cool as Ryan Reynolds
item.description:
I wish I were 1/3 as cool as Ryan Reynolds

This album is really big! It's going to take us a bit to get your download ready for you. Enter your email and we will notify you when it's ready. Once ready, it will be available for up to 24 hours.

item.title: Ex-champ Michael Chandler signs long-term extension with Bellator
item.description:
Ex-champ Michael Chandler signs long-term extension with Bellator

After talking up his value and calling for big fights, ex-lightweight champ Michael Chandler has signed a long-term contract extension with Bellator MMA. The Viacom-owned promotion announced the deal today, characterizing it as a "multi-year, multi-fight contract extension."

item.title: Promotion chief won't pull Jason 'Mayhem' Miller from return fight, scolds media
item.description:
Promotion chief won't pull Jason 'Mayhem' Miller from return fight, scolds media

MMA veteran Jason Miller has at least one voice of support after yet another tangle with the law - that of the promoter bringing him back to the cage.

item.title: Urijah Faber: The only reason Dominick Cruz is alive is we have rules in MMA
item.description:
Urijah Faber: The only reason Dominick Cruz is alive is we have rules in MMA

Former WEC champ Urijah Faber is firing back at Dominick Cruz after the UFC bantamweight champ offered to "gift" him a title shot. On Instagram, Faber reminded Cruz of his credentials and called for an expected title rematch, declaring, "I wanna be the one to break the glass champ!!"

item.title: Stephen Thompson: I'd put on a better show than Tyron Woodley in welterweight title shot
item.description:
Stephen Thompson: I'd put on a better show than Tyron Woodley in welterweight title shot

Stephen Thompson picked up a big upset against Johny Hendricks at UFC Fight Night 82, knocking the former welterweight champion out in the first round. Even in the short fight, it didn't take long for Thompson to realize that he had Hendricks where he wanted him.
